page.title: 08MARKET DAY, BOURNE
page.content: On Thursdays and Saturdays there are many more shoppers in the town centre because of the street market.People come from further afield to the market and this brings customers into other shops in the town centre. The market stalls are convenient because often the goods are cheaper and they are also near the other shops but they are unpopular with some people because they block up the road for traffic when people are trying to travel to work. You often cannot park your car near the shops if you need to stop and buy something. People who like to shop on Market Days buy their food and clothes in the town.Otherwise, most people in Bourne go to the Rainbow Supermarket.Good quality clothes and shoes can be bought in town but for more choice people prefer to go to Peterborough.
